title: Problem With Update Installed Today
content:

Unable to restore tab. It is impossible to use the Firefox with this upgrade. Looks like I need to find another browser.

title: "Search History" List

creator: chef22

title: A list of installed extensions...
content:
Hello everyone. I make backups of folder "bookmarkbackups" in Firefox profile folder, so that when I have to make a restore after a data loss (for whatever reason), I can also restore my bookmarks. I'd like to be able to restore my extensions too, and to do this it would be enough to have a backup of the list of extensions I had installed before the trouble happened. However, if I backup the subfolder "extensions" of the profile folder, I would have a list of files the name of which looks like:

FirefoxColor@mozilla.com.xpi idcac-pub@guus.ninja.xpi uBlock0@raymondhill.net.xpi vpn@proton.ch.xpi {3d92ddc3-5581-453f-ad9f-d9ea864d1f9a}.xpi {531906d3-e22f-4a6c-a102-8057b88a1a63}.xpi

..so that in most cases I cannot guess the extension name from the file name. My purpose is to install manually the extensions in the new browser installation, once I have the list of the extensions. Moreover, in that folder you find all the extensions, both the ones which were active, and the ones which were inactive... But I'd like to have a list of the active ones so that I can re-install only that ones.

Does anyone know how can I get such a list, starting from the profile folder?

Many thanks in advance.
creator: gplus.clean

title: Firefox password manager has deleted all my passwords. 346 of them.
content: Does anyone know how to retrieve them?
creator: suzidowner

title: How to restore tabs and groups of tabs
content: I had a ton of saved tabs and groupings of tabs. I closed what I thought was my only open Firefox window then downloaded and installed the most recent Windows update. When I rebooted, I did not realize I had left a Firefox window open with a single tab. That Firefox became my default and I lost all the tabs I had. Is there any way to get those tabs back? The tabs I had yesterday, 1/22/2026 are the ones I need.
creator: pam-raby

title: Ai video
content: Ek baar ki baat hai, ek duniya thi jiska naam tha Gulab Jamun Lok. Wahan zameen gulab jamun ki thi—naram, gol aur halka sa chipchipi. Ped bhi gulab jamun ke the, jin par se chashni tapakti rehti. Aasmaan halka bhura tha, jaise doodh aur cheeni milkar baadal ban gaye hon. Is duniya mein rehne wala ek chhota sa ladka tha—Golu. Golu ko gulab jamun bahut pasand the, par itni mithaas roz-roz usse thoda bore bhi kar deti.
creator: brijmohansardarbrijmohan

title: Why doesn't Firefox fix the problem with the bookmarks toolbar rather than providing instructions that people try to follow.  I have "fixed this" three times and because I am old, I have trouble following even though I have read the instructions.  Thanks
content: I need a more permanent fix to the disappearing bookmarks issue when the file is in use by another entity. I have tried to fix it, read the instructions and when I start to apply the fix, the instructions disappear and now I have to depend on my faulty memory.
